About Me

Who I Am

Hi! I'm Nick Pham, a Computer Science student at California State University Northridge, specializing in Cybersecurity. I'm passionate about leveraging AI and machine learning to build intelligent, efficient web applications.

My approach combines traditional programming fundamentals with modern AI-augmented workflows, allowing me to rapidly prototype and iterate on complex projects. I'm particularly interested in transformer architectures, prompt engineering, and building seamless user experiences.
